Good Game but sometimes not fair (maybe u play with cheater)
classic fps shooting game but exotic society .

Since the game became F2P more and more cheaters appeared. There is no round without cheaters.
Well, to be honest, the game was bad even before becoming F2P.
The worst is the wierd spray pattern, its like the bullets fly straight right or left when u start spraying.
If the enemy is right infront of you, like 1 meter away, the bullets wont hit the target, even if you aim right on it. Dont get me wrong i have pretty good aim, but the bullet flying angle to sraight right or left is just retarded.
This game is bullshit and i dont even know why i have spend so many hours in it.
An sich, fürs tilten und salzen ein tolles game. Und macht auch mit m8s viel spaß. mfg. xd
it's a very good game,but annoying
Просто игра для даунов, одни пидорасы с конфиком от шока, просто говноеды, ненавижу эту игру.
Jogo muito bom , otimo para passar o tempo jogando com os amigos ! Muito top

Every round won feels like I'm on top of the world, nothing can stop me
Every round lost feels like I hate this game and myself, going to unistall it right now
Then someone earns a drop, realise I can get a drop too, the cycle repeats
This game is really make me have fun, when playing it with friends
Когда остаешься 1 в 5 и твои тиммейты говорят эйс или кик. Делаешь -5 и тебя кикают 10 тиммейтов из 10
Le voy a dar un voto negativo porque es superdificil jugar con el ratón del portatil.
I didn't pay $2.50 just to get a 3 cent skin
всем привет я только что проснулся
I hate this game but play it nevertheless.

Global matchmaking is a joke.
Every game has atleast one cheater on each team.

Trust factor is a joke.
10 year old account with 50+ games, 1400+ hrs on CS:GO and I get matched with accounts that were made a week or so ago, only game is CS:GO, played 2000hrs in 2 weeks (not kidding actually saw someone with this). Only 3/10 games are not full of cheaters.

The new operations are a joke. The challenges are boring, uninspired and just aren't fun to play. The nice strike missions and guardian missions come in so low quantity. There are more missions like these available on the workshop.

I can't really say that you get any enjoyment out of this game at the moment. No wonder Valorant is popping off. Valorant has a better anti cheat, 128 tick servers, but just doesn't deliver the same feel like CS. For me at least.

I just wish that Valve actually tries to get this game back where it should be. I just want to play global mm without getting killed by a spin botter with a 16 hr acc.
